author: @Glumclam
text: After all the social unrest of the 60s I naively assumed we would begin to see change, then we elected Reagan.  I guess change takes a long while but I still have hope.

author: @grahamjones5400
text: I disagree with Dr. Garrido , capitalism has given us something, capitalism gave us climate change and plastic pollution, thats something.

author: @samaval9920
text: Dr. King called himself a « black socialist »,

author: @dustjamesamerica
text: Enjoyed this talk, brother. Id only take it a step further. Workers were most united and saw the most victories when Communists upheld the full dignity of national self-determination and liberation of oppressed peoples. Revisionists like Winston, from a position of weakness, did our movement a disservice, by attacking black radicals that King refused to attack. Haywood who was repressed by the revisionists wasn't a force of disunity but laid the understanding that was required to facilitate unity.

author: @Shamala-Hairless
text: A beautiful quote by Carlos- "Capitalism hasn't given us shit!" My favorite quote anyway❤️
